Html:
HI all...
first, I want to say sorry if my english are bad..

actually I want to develop vision-based Hand interaction in augmented reality environment based on this journal/paper
http://www.tandfonline.com/doi/abs/10.1080/10447318.2011.555297
, so the hand can interact with virtual object(AR)
but in order to make those things work, I have to detect/track hand, then the tracked hand can interact with virtual object. 

Is it possible to develop these AR system using goblinXNA??

Yes, that's totally possible. Tutorial 15 shows how you can combine OpenCV 2.1 with Goblin XNA. If you want to use other versions of OpenCV, you can see how I wrapped it in the source code and do whatever you need for hand tracking.

Ohan
